name: MySQL Tool
semantic_context: Get, add and update data in MySQL
natural_language_description: 这是 MySQL Tool 节点。主要用于: Get, add and update data in MySQL

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Get, add and update data in MySQL
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Get, add and update data in MySQL | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: database
available_options: Database (值: database)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: insert
available_options: Delete (值: deleteTable) - Delete an entire table or rows in a table
Execute SQL (值: executeQuery) - Execute an SQL query
Insert (值: insert) - Insert rows in a table
Insert or Update (值: upsert) - Insert or update rows in a table
Select (值: select) - Select rows from a table
Update (值: update) - Update rows in a table

table.name: table
table.description: The table you want to work on
table.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table | 作用: The table you want to work on | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

deleteCommand.name: deleteCommand
deleteCommand.natural_language_description: 参数名: Command | 默认值: truncate
available_options: Truncate (值: truncate) - Only removes the table's data and preserves the table's structure
Delete (值: delete) - Delete the rows that match the 'Select Rows' conditions below. If no selection is made, all rows in the table are deleted.
Drop (值: drop) - Deletes the table's data and also the table's structure permanently

where.name: where
where.description: If not set, all rows will be selected
where.natural_language_description: 参数名: Select Rows | 作用: If not set, all rows will be selected | 默认值: {}
available_options: values (值: None)

combineConditions.name: combineConditions
combineConditions.description: How to combine the conditions defined in "Select Rows": AND requires all conditions to be true, OR requires at least one condition to be true
combineConditions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Combine Conditions | 作用: How to combine the conditions defined in "Select Rows": AND requires all conditions to be true, OR requires at least one condition to be true | 默认值: AND
available_options: AND (值: AND) - Only rows that meet all the conditions are selected
OR (值: OR) - Rows that meet at least one condition are selected

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: connectionTimeoutMillis (值: None) - Number of milliseconds reserved for connecting to the database
connectionLimit (值: None) - Maximum amount of connections to the database, setting high value can lead to performance issues and potential database crashes
queryBatching (值: None) - The way queries should be sent to the database
queryReplacement (值: None) - Comma-separated list of the values you want to use as query parameters. You can drag the values from the input panel on the left. More info
outputColumns (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
largeNumbersOutput (值: None)
decimalNumbers (值: None) - Whether to output DECIMAL types as numbers instead of strings
priority (值: None) - Ignore any ignorable errors that occur while executing the INSERT statement
replaceEmptyStrings (值: None) - Whether to replace empty strings with NULL in input, could be useful when data come from spreadsheet
selectDistinct (值: None) - Whether to remove these duplicate rows
detailedOutput (值: None) - Whether to show in output details of the ofexecuted query for each statement, or just confirmation of success
skipOnConflict (值: None) - Whether to skip the row and do not throw error if a unique constraint or exclusion constraint is violated

query.name: query
query.description: The SQL query to execute. You can use n8n expressions and $1, $2, $3, etc to refer to the 'Query Parameters' set in options below.
query.natural_language_description: 参数名: Query | 作用: The SQL query to execute. You can use n8n expressions and $1, $2, $3, etc to refer to the 'Query Parameters' set in options below. | 提示: Consider using query parameters to prevent SQL injection attacks. Add them in the options below | (必填项)

dataMode.name: dataMode
dataMode.description: Whether to map node input properties and the table data automatically or manually
dataMode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data Mode | 作用: Whether to map node input properties and the table data automatically or manually | 默认值: autoMapInputData
available_options: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns (值: autoMapInputData) - Use when node input properties names exactly match the table column names
Map Each Column Below (值: defineBelow) - Set the value for each destination column manually

notice.displayName: In this mode, make sure incoming data fields are named the same as the columns in your table. If needed, use an 'Edit Fields' node before this node to change the field names.
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description:
参数名: 
		In this mode, make sure incoming data fields are named the same as the columns in your table. If needed, use an 'Edit Fields' node before this node to change the field names.

valuesToSend.name: valuesToSend
valuesToSend.natural_language_description: 参数名: Values to Send | 默认值: {}
available_options: values (值: None)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

sort.name: sort
sort.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sort | 默认值: {}
available_options: values (值: None)

columnToMatchOn.name: columnToMatchOn
columnToMatchOn.description: The column to compare when finding the rows to update. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
columnToMatchOn.natural_language_description: 参数名: Column to Match On | 作用: The column to compare when finding the rows to update. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | 提示: Used to find the correct row to update. Doesn't get changed. Has to be unique. | (必填项)

valueToMatchOn.displayName: Value of Column to Match On
valueToMatchOn.name: valueToMatchOn
valueToMatchOn.description: Rows with a value in the specified "Column to Match On" that corresponds to the value in this field will be updated. New rows will be created for non-matching items.
valueToMatchOn.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value of Column to Match On | 作用: Rows with a value in the specified "Column to Match On" that corresponds to the value in this field will be updated. New rows will be created for non-matching items.
